attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: min
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: max
attrs.desc: Set the maximum value. The value must be an integer and can be a negative number. The value must be greater than the minimum value set.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 100.

attrs.name: step
attrs.desc: Displacement distance of each step when the slider moves. The value must be a positive integer greater than 0.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1

attrs.name: show-input
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display the text box. This parameter is valid only for non-range selection.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: vertical
attrs.desc: Whether the vertical mode is used
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: height
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 300px.

attrs.name: value
attrs.desc: Sets the current value of a single slider. The value must be an integer or an array. ;Bound Value
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: num-pages
attrs.desc: Set the total number of steps. That is, when you press PageDown or PageUp, the moving distance is (maximum value â€“ minimum value)/number of pages. The optional value of this attribute is 0
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1

attrs.name: show-tip
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

events.name: change
events.desc: Triggered when the value changes (When you drag the mouse, it is triggered only after you release the mouse). When the arg:{Number|Array slider is not selected in a range, the value is the current value of the slider. When the slider is a range selection, it is the array of the current values of the slider}

events.name: Start
events.desc: This event is triggered when the slider starts to slide. When the arg:{Number|Array slider is not selected in a range, the value is the current value of the slider. When the slider is a range selection, it is the array of the current values of the slider}

events.name: Stop
events.desc: This event is triggered when the slider sliding ends. When the arg:{Number|Array slider is not selected in a range, the value is the current value of the slider. When the slider is a range selection, it is the array of the current values of the slider}
